1523322211112.content:
The rest of the previous day was largely uneventful after a very flustered Ruby left your room as a cloud of rose petals. You chalked up your conditioning attempt as a success, and her sudden exit as her social awkwardness mixing up with it. It was honestly very cute to see her face turn a bright red. In your mind Ruby presumably isn't used to those kind of feelings yet, but given time and more conditioning you can help her out with the feelings you put inside her.

It was currently near the end of the lunch period and you had put away your tray when you spotted Ruby heading in your direction accompanied by her busty blonde sister Yang by her. When Ruby noticed you she stops in her tracks while blush from yesterday made a return across her face. Yang quizzically looks at her little sister, wondering what caused Ruby to start acting like a nervous schoolgirl seeing her crush. Sure enough she moved her head, and her eyes landed directly on you.

Yang examines you before letting off a small grin and whispering something in Ruby's ear that caused her to look more embarrassed. You wonder how this is going to play out.
1523322211112.title: Skip to the next day

choices: She's nervous because of her crush and loses the fight.
She wants to impress you and wins
15233222111124.content:
Ruby left with a huff, followed by her sister who was no doubt teasing the poor girl. Oh well, Ruby will come to you eventually and if she doesn't you can always approach her. It was unlikely she'd reject you.

The went by pretty slowly, punctuated by the occasional glance over to Ruby who was trying her best to not look like she was watching you. It was pretty cute.

When combat class came around something interesting happened.

"The next match up is...Ruby Rose VS Anon." Glynda said as the last students shuffled their way out of the area.

You look at your opponent who's head was in her hands. This would be interesting.
15233222111124.title: Something Else

152332221112.content:
You are normally not an impetuous person, but your curiosity over what effect a long kiss will do to someone entranced by your eye. Why go through a tedious process where you'll have to slowly influence Ruby over time you tell yourself. Especially when she is in your room right now, and you can cut to the chase with just one salvia swapping session. Not worrying about anyone catching you having a mind control session with her out in the middle of a hallway or room is also something you can avoid as well. Forget being labeled as a creep or being expelled from Beacon if that happens. What Ruby's older sister will do to you makes fighting a Nevermore barehanded seem more preferable.

"Hey, Ruby," you say to the mostly unwilling guest to your room.

"Yes?"

Before you reply to her you take another good look at her. You are more into girls with bigger curves like Yang or Goodwitch, but Ruby's body isn't necessarily unattractive. Maybe in a few years she'll develop more similarly into Yang's body type.

It does occur to you that you are about to throw a Beowulf sized wrench into this girl's life if you go through with this. You have talked to Ruby before a few times. All she aspires to be in life is a huntress, and here you are moments away from potentially turning her into a slave. Your slave. Will you even stop at her? Will you turn your mesmerizing gaze on her friends and teammates?

Wait a minute. There's no need for you to be mulling over this. Just create yourself a battle-harem full of huntresses. Maintaining world peace and casting down the forces of evil by day, servicing you by night. Yes. Hell motherfugging yes. And with one sexy and awesome thought you just got rid of all your fomenting internal conflict. Pat yourself on the back.

However. you probably need to be more strategic about this, and plan ahead. Start your harem out small. Four to five girls. The rest of Team RWBY will do just fine. And you especially need to be careful in regards of certain activities. Getting your girls pregnant while you're still a student at Beacon is a very stupid idea. Angry parents and Professor Ozpin will presumably not enjoy your explanation as to why their daughters and his faculty members are now pregnant, kicked out of school, and calling you "Master." You want kids but you also want to get your Huntsman license. You also want to avoid birth control pills. You've recently read an article about how those things end up messing with women's hormones quite negatively.

You'll think of something when you cross that bridge.

"Have you ever kissed a guy before? No, giving your dad a peck on the cheek doesn't count."

"No. These lips have never made contact with anyone else's before." She answers.

"Well, that's about to change. I'm going to give you a nice-" as you say that Ruby starts to shake meaning you found something she's going to be uncomfortable with. Nice going doing this with a socially awkward girl.

You give Ruby an eyeful and attempt to reassure the enthralled girl she has nothing to worry about. The both of you will enjoy this. You probably ought take it slow with her just to be safe.

Ruby trembles as her lips pucker up and you take your time to press your own upon hers. So far so good. Your tongue creeps out and passes through into her mouth, the shaking intensifies some. As your salvia begins to enter her mouth you finally find her tongue. Might as well make this special for her.

The minute your tongues wrap around the others the scythe wielding girl shakes hard enough you start to worry this is going to end very poorly for you. Goodbye Beacon and hello Yang's fists.

You try to break the kiss, but to your surprise Ruby pulls you back in. You heard a cute little moan out of her too. She's enjoying it more than you imagined.

You mentally chuckle. By the time you're done Ruby Rose is going to be all yours. Heart, body and soul. She probably is at this point. The two of you break apart for a breather, and her eyes slowly regain their color. You turn around to get a spare eyepatch to cover your eye. You're out of aura now so no more hypno sessions until you grow stronger at using your semblance. Ruby still has that out of it look, and you wonder if you fried her brain.

That prospect flew out of the window upon you asking her about the mechanics of Crescent Rose, and Ruby returns to her usual self when weapons are involved. You're going to love spending the rest of your life with this girl.

Option #1: Talk with your new devoted slave. Give her the reason why your room is so barebones and why you're team-less. Or go play video games with her. Whatever comes first.
Option #2: It sure would be bad if someone barraged into your room after looking for Ruby and saw her enter your room. Especially since if you can't use your semblance on them now. But you're a smart guy right? You can totally talk your way out of this hypothetical situation, right?
152332221112.title: The Rose is Yours and Yours alone

1523322211121.content:
"So, Ruby," you begin to say, "If I told you to start calling me "Master" when we're alone would you do it?"

"Uh, sure, Master," she replies.

Well this appears to be a good start.

"I'm going to need your help with two things, Ruby. First thing: help me out on finding certain girls to use my semblance on."

She tilts her head quizzically. "Why would you want to do that, Master? What does your semblance do exactly?"

"I call it "Máti kai Filí". It's why I need these eyepatches on," you point to the eyepatch you're currently wearing. "Anyone who sees my left eye is placed under a hypnotized state where I can give them little suggestions that affect their personalities if I so choose to."

"Your semblance is mind control? Not really much of a good guy ability, but still kinda cool." Said Ruby.

"Trust me. I wish it was regular hypnosis and not this. Getting used to these patches drove me crazy," you grumbled. "But that's not all it does." You finish explaining to your slave how you can make your target devoted to you if you can place some of your saliva into their mouth, and how it really depends on the strength of their will power and how they feel about you beforehand. Ruby can see why you preferred regular mind control over all that work now.

She also doesn't show any particular signs of enjoying the prospect of joining you on this endeavor; however, what choice does she have now that she's devoted to you? Ruby might still be Ruby but she will follow you anywhere now. You tell her since she is the first member of your soon to be expanding harem she gets to be the head girl which confuses her to a degree.

"You'll be to me what Professor Goodwitch is to Professor Ozpin. You get it now?"

"Now I get it." She coughs before doing her best Goodwitch impression she can manage getting a laugh out of you. Not too bad you tell her.

"Second thing I need help with. Mind helping me out?" You asked. "If I don't improve my skills I won't be able to stay at Beacon."

"Shouldn't you ask your team about this?" Come to think of it your dorm seems to posses more than enough space to suit more than a mere one person. All that's in here are a few beds, books, and just you. Really activates her almonds when she thinks about it more. "You do have a team right, Master?"

Your mood turns quite dour, and you fall over onto a nearby bed. "I lost two of them in that crazy breach. Grimm just started pouring out on the streets, and it's an absolute miracle we had our weapons with us. Not that it helped all that much. We got overrun, and two of us went down before Professor Port and Professor Goodwitch bailed out what was left us." You explained, the hopeless battle replaying in vivid detail all over again.

Ruby brings you back into reality, expressing her condolences and apologizes for asking about topic you hate thinking about. You sigh and finish your tale. "The parents of my surviving teammate and friend came by and took him back home. As you can see, Team A isn't really effective when there's only one person as the "A"."

"Haven't you tried getting into a new team, Master?"

"I've tried, but there aren't many openings at the moment. I can get moved to a team if I impress Professor Ozpin enough though. So there's that." You rise off the bed with a less down in the dumps look. "I just want to know what happened that day, you know? It really feels like someone was behind it." You turn to her, and it almost looks like Ruby knows more about the breach than you think. Maybe she and her gang got trapped in that too?

Ruby starts telling you of how her went on a trip with Oobleck a few days ago, ending up in a fight with the militant faunus group called the White Fang and a criminal named Torchwick who they've been dealing with for a some time now. While her story is certainly fascinating you were going to stop and ask in the middle of what this had to do with your predicament. Until Ruby placed the blame for the breach upon the Fang and Torchwick. That got you really interested and really in the mood for some payback. She then tells you last saw Torchwick being taken into custody. Time for you to get more creative.

"Say, this Torchwick guy didn't happen to have any girls as cute as you hanging around him did he?" You ask with some evil intent in your visible eye.

"There was that one," Ruby says, trying to remember the name of Roman's sidekick that aided him during one bout they had. "I think he called her "Neo".

"Neo, huh? Can't wait to meet her." You lost two of your friends because this guy did so you're going to take his Neo. Ruby advised you to be cautious in that regards. Something about this Neo girl gave Yang a hard time during that train brawl. That will require some more planning out now that you think about it.

Revenge plots aside what will you do now?
Option 1: Do something nice for Ruby since she's the first member of your harem. Might as well since you're now stuck with her
Option #2: Skip to the next day
1523322211121.title: Talk with Rubes

choices: Go about the rest of your day
15233222111212.content:
You do not remember if anything important happened after you sent Ruby away. You doubt it. You probably passed out on your bed because going full throttle on Ruby needed a huge chunk of your aura. In fact, you would bet money on it given how miserable you were upon waking up. Lousy semblance. You made a mental note as you hastily dressed yourself this morning to take it easier with any potential targets of yours in the future.

But for now, you are writing down anything you deem important from Professor Goodwitch's mouth on your notebook as the lecture continues. It's not that difficult anymore since you read books on becoming a better note taker. At least you think so.

You definitely will not try your hand at using your semblance on the instructor any time soon. Glynda might be very attractive for her age, but you prefer not receiving the boot out of Beacon. Still, the idea of using her riding crop on her one day is quite tantalizing.

You used your uncovered eye to look around the room and it landed on the first member of your harem. Busy writing down her own notes like a good student Ruby fails to notice your attention. You wonder if she has any ideas on who to use your eye on next, or if she'll leave that in your purview. Most likely she will. You do not believe Ruby has a knack for that. You do however believe today might be a good day for you to hone your skills through a training session with her. Taking notes in class does not help in thinning the horde of grimm in the world.

You divert your eye to the individual next to Ruby, a girl with an air of elegance you find very alluring. Even the scarred left eye of Weiss Schnee adds to her charm. You don't really know too much about Weiss herself beyond the fact she's the granddaughter of the founder of the SDC, Nicholas Schnee, and she's a talented student at this academy. You are curious about who Weiss really is, and what kind of possibilities your touch can have with her. The Schnee Dust Company's website provided you very little information on her when you did a report on her grandfather for one of your classes. You swear a company as wealthy as her family's could clearly afford better website designers too.

"Ahem." Your thoughts regarding Weiss and poor website designs are interrupted by an expecting Goodwitch who noticed you may have stopped paying attention to the lecture. "Mr. Anon, could you possibly tell the class what the semblance of the most notorious war criminal of the Great War was?" She asked, putting you on the spot.

"Uh, well," you mutter trying to remember the answer without looking at your notes. "His semblance allowed him to create wings out of his aura?" You answered unsure.

"Correct."

For the rest of the class you paid attention on her lecture and focused less on what you're going to do afterwards. Which by the way, your time here is done. What will you do now?

Since I apparently now have an upgraded account there will be five options.
Option #1: go practice with Ruby. You need it.
Option #2: Try your hand at Weiss
Option #3: Option #2 but something or someone gets in your way
Option #4: Go do your own thing. Enjoy your day.
Option #5: Reader's choice
15233222111212.title: Scribbling Notes

choices: Take some risks and go bigger.
Might as well see how far you can push it.
15233222112.content:
“Ouch!” You knocked a girl down and immediately scrambled to your feet. Not realizing your eyepatch slipped off.

“I’m sorry!” You apologized really fast and reached a hand down to help her out. The black hair, amber eyes, and bow told you that it was Blake Belladonna. One of the top girls in the year and an absolute stunner.
https://images.app.goo.gl/y11X8fAS3EwAEb...

“I’m fine,” Blake said, dusting herself off. “I wasn’t watching where I was going either.”

You notice her book was on the ground and picked it up, reading the cover.

“Ninjas of Love?” You asked.

“Give that back!” She quickly yanked it out of your hands, cheeks turning pink.

“What volume are you on?”” You asked.

“You saw…. What?” She blinked in surprise. “You read it too?”

“Yeah,” you admit, though your face felt warm and you scratched your cheek. “I read the first one for a dare and just liked the series, so I kept at it.”

“I’ve read them all,” Blake admitted. “I’m just rereading.” She looked up and her eyes met yours. She looked excited and then they started to dull. “Your… eyepatch…”

Crap!

You realized it fell off when you crashed into her and not that your eyes met, she was going into a trance. Well, you wanted to try it out anyways, so now was the time. The thing was, Blake was pretty strong willed, or so you guessed. It was going to take time, so maybe you should be careful to just start conditioning her. Make her slowly gain feelings for you. Of course, the more risk, the more reward.
15233222112.title: Blake

choices: You wander around Beacon a bit more.
You see Blake the next day.
152332221122.content:
“Blake, can you hear me?” You asked, making sure to maintain eye contact. You prayed no one else would show up and interrupt everything.

“Yeeesss.” Blake murmured in a monotone.

“Now, you like Ninja’s of Love, right?”

“Yeeeess.”

“And you like having someone else appreciate it too, right?”

“Yeeesss.”

“How many other people do you know that likes it?” You asked.

“No one…”

“I see. So having someone like it is rare.”

“Yes.” Her words weren’t drawn out, but her tone was the same.

“Rare can mean special, right?”

“Sometimes.”

“This is one of those times,” You tell her. “In fact, it’s so rare, you can’t stop thinking about me.”

“Can’t stop… thinking about you?”

“Correct. You want to talk to people who share interests like me. Whenever you daydream or are bored, you’re going to think of me.”

“Whenever bored, will think of you.”

“Yes, think of me.” You pressed on. It was important to keep him in her thoughts to weaken any resistance. “Every day, you think of me.”

“Every day I think of you.” Blake repeated.

“At night, you might even have erotic dreams.” You pushed. This was a risk.

“At night… I’ll have… what?” her tone started to gain a little of her own personality back.

“Relax,” You tell her and you saw her shoulders slack a little. “it’s only natural to imagine Ninja of Love scenes. They are such wonderfully written. The adult parts make the story.”

“Of course.” She agreed.

“It’s just, when you imagine those scenes, you will imagine yourself in there.” You carefully say. “It’s only right to imagine the guy as someone who appreciates the story.”

“Guy has to… appreciate the story.” Blake repeated.

“And I’m the only guy you know that likes Ninjas of Love.”

“You are.” She slowly nodded.

“So it makes sense to imagine us acting out those scenes.”

“It makes sense.” Blake agreed.

“Every time you have one of those dreams, you will feel horny,” You continue. “This horniness will come back anytime you see me. When you see me, you remember those dreams.”

“I’ll get horny when I have those dreams,” Blake stated. “Seeing you will cause me to remember those dreams and feelings.”

“Very good.” You tell her. “Now, after I kiss you and walk away, you will wake up and not remember consciously anything except that I like Ninjas of Love and we talked about it for a little bit. All my suggestions will stay.”

“I will only remember us talking about Ninjas of Love.” Blake muttered. ”But all of your suggestions will stay.”

“Good girl.” You leaned forward and pressed your lips against hers. They parted slightly and you pushed your tongue in, careful to add some of your drool into her mouth. She tasted good and you regretted break contact. You left and didn’t see her snap out of the trance and looking confused.
152332221122.title: Take some risks and go bigger.

choices: Condition the Kot and send her on her way
Kiss the girl and enslave the kot
152332221123.content:
There's really no harm in seeing how far you can push this. Well besides Blake breaking out of her trance, beating you up, and telling everyone you're a creep who tries to mind control people. Other than that no harm at all.

"I would like to know more about you, Blake." You say to the enthralled girl. You think getting her to talk about the more private details of her life would be a great start before you attempt more risque ideas. "But let's take this to somewhere more private, okay?"

She slowly nods her head before giving you a less than lively "Sure".

The two of you leave the more crowded area, and head for a better place for you to get a girl under a trance to spill her guts to you. If such a place really existed. You decide to grab Blake's left hand to see how she reacts, and it appears she doesn't seem poised to return to normal. What would happen if you get more physical than mere hand holding?

You use your other hand to wrap around Blake's waist and she stops in her tracks. She shakes slightly, her eyes slowly become less dull with life returning to them. Yep. That's a tell tale sign you found something to make Blake uncomfortable enough for the trance to show fracturing. You give her another dose of Máti kai Filí to stop the shaking.

"Everything alright, Blake?"

Her eyes return the dullness they previously were earlier. Maybe a little duller, and she starts mouthing words without actually saying anything. You certainly hope you don't end up frying Blake's brain until she's a drooling vegetable for the rest of her life.

"Blake?"

"I'm... fine." She replies to your relief.

The two of you find an empty classroom that was left unlocked to provide you with your private place. How thoughtful.

"So, Blake. Is there anything you're embarrassed about?" You asked the dull eyed girl. "That wasn't really a good way of phrasing it. Is there anything you don't want most people outside your little group of friends and family to know about?"

It takes her a while to answer you, the shaking returns, and color begins to return to her eyes before going back to their entranced state. But you get something out of her. "I'm a faunus."

"Really you? I'm not seeing it. Mind sharing with the class your proof?" Blake reaches for her hair ribbon, taking it off to reveal a pair of black cat ears that were previously hidden by the bow. "I think they're kinda nice."

You ask her if there's anything else she has any other secrets under wraps that she will gladly share with the rest of the class again. What you got was a story of her time in the White Fang, what you've heard and were led to believe is a terrorist organization full of faunus who decided that militant violence is the only way to get their kind respected. You're not entirely sure what to say about that. Blake doesn't really give off that kind of vibe to you, and she also did say she left because of the Fang's gradual increase of violence.

On that note, you move on to another push. Playing with Blake's cat ears. She gives off some shaking but it also looks like she's enjoying it. Time to bust out the big guns. Your hands move further south, towards Blake's chest, and you cup her breasts. She shakes harder than before causing you to end your short lived groping session but not before you give her another eyefull of your left eye. On one hand you found your limit with Blake, something she clearly enjoyed as much as you playing with her ears if not a little more. Now what will you do?
152332221123.title: Might as well see how far you can push it.

1523322211231.content:
In light of this progress you have with Blake you decide to call it quits with her today. You got to play with her cat ears, tried to feel her up, and gained more understanding about this girl's life. Fairly successful if you had to say.

Blake is going to be your kitty and nothing is going to stop that. But you are going to need to slow walk her into that. Her will is a tad bit too strong for you to enslave outright and making her your number one fangirl, plus doing so might actually fry her brain as you're worried about. However, you will give your kitty a touch of conditioning to make it easier for you to finish the job. Something simple and not overtly drastic the way making her a sex fiend or a yandere as those would raise some questions.

"Blake, listen to me. From now on you're going to enjoy my company more, and want to hang out with me more. Got it?" You were halfway tempted to add she will be more brave about exposing her faunus heritage, but you thought at the last minute that's something Blake needs to do on her own eventually.

Blake nods her head affirmatively. Excellent. You surprise the enthralled girl with a quick kiss planted in her lips, sending enough of your saliva is placed in her mouth to get the conditioning to work. She predictably shakes but that subsided rather quickly. You play with the ears of your new kitty one last time before you have her hide them away with her bow.

The two of you are in the hallway where you put your eyepatch back on, and Blake returns to normal mildly confused.

"This isn't where-" Blake clutched at her head in pain. You sure do hope she didn't get brain damage because of you. Another highlight of today: if Blake is going to be the standard for most strong willed girls three usages of your semblance is completely unnecessary.

"Do you want me to take you to the nurse's office?" You ask with concern in your voice.

Blake smiles. "Yeah, that would be nice."

You take your kitty to the vet, you mean nurse's office and say goodbye for now.

The rest of the day wasn't too eventful. Boring classes, did a little sparring with other students, and watched one of your favorite persons here at tussle in the ring after you.

Nora Valkyrie.

Nora certainly is an interesting girl you have to say. You could watch her just be herself for hours, you often wonder what you could do if you had some of her energy.

Though what happened in the ring ought to have been against the rules of Beacon. Though it would be hard to make ignorance against the rules you think. The poor sap who sparred with her had a Lightning semblance and used it on her with no prior knowledge about what electricity does to Nora. And kept using it on her and she fell on the ground laughing and saying his lightning tickled. You wonder when he's going to be able to regret his decision. After he's able to walk properly again no doubt.

What will you do now?
Option #1: Try your hand at Nora
Option #2: Turn in for the day, get a surprise visit from your kitty at three in the morning

1523322211232.content:
“Well Blake,” You said. “Did you like my playing with your ears?”

“Yes… you were gentle. Most people don’t understand how sensitive they are.”

“Would you let me rub them some more?” You asked.

She nodded and you began to rub them gently between your fingers. There wasn’t any shaking this time, but you noticed there was a little shivering from excitement. Then you heard a sound coming from her throat. It was a purr. She was purring. Maybe the cat traits in her were a little stronger than normal. For whatever reason, you found it cute. You had to have her.

“Blake, I’m going to kiss you.” You tell her and you saw her body begin to stiffen. “There’s no reason to be afraid. It’s going to feel good, just like me playing with your ears. You want it. Trust me.” You gave her another dose of your Semblence. Her body relaxed and her eyes remained dull. “Is it okay?”

“If it’s you, yes.” She agreed.

“You don’t like physical contact much, do you?”

“No, not really.”

“If it’s from me, it will feel pleasant,” You assure her. “So anytime from now on, any touch from me will feel pleasurable, just like with your ears.” She nodded and you bent in to kiss her. When she puckered up her own lips, you froze. There was one other thing you wanted to add.

“Some other girls may need my help overcoming troubles too,” you tell her. “So there’s no need to get jealous if you see me with another girl. Understand?”

“Yes.” Blake said.

You laughed internally and finally kissed her. Your lips and hers melded together. She tasted fruity, but you couldn’t tell what kind. Working your tongue forward, you separated her lips so you could get your saliva in her mouth. Making sure to put plenty in there, it took time to break the kiss. You took a step back and let her stand there, seemingly stuck in the kissing pose.

“Crap.” You were worried you might have overloaded her brain. However, you notice her slowly going back to normal. Now that you had kissed her, she should be devoted to you. If her will was to strong, it probably wasn’t a good idea to stick around. You decided to head out and if it worked, she would find you. “Bye, Blake. I hope to see you soon.”
1523322211232.title: Kiss the girl and enslave the kot

15233222112321.content:
You were a little disappointed that Blake didn’t immediately go and look for you, so you headed toward your next class. It might take another session or two to get her to be completely enamored with you. It was combat class with Glynda Goodwitch and you hoped you got an easy opponent. You got to class early and sat down. Other people began to stumble in and you saw Blake enter. She met your eyes, smiled, and waved. You gave a small wave back and then saw Blake’s partner, a blonde named Yang.

That girl was hot and had some of the biggest breasts in the school.

She obviously notice your and Blake’s actions so when she sat down, she was whispering excitedly to Blake. Blake tried to ignore her and focus on her book. You snickered and waited for class to begin. Glynda started off with a fight that seemed to happen frantically. Jaune versus Cardin. Jaune was a nice guy, though his combat skills were really subpar.

Cardin was just an asshole.

He bullied Faunus and anyone he thought weaker than him. Sparingly, he didn’t bully Jaune much anymore, but enjoyed smacking him around in the ring. His large mace and powerful build did a lot fo damage. You were often surprised Jaune could block it as much as he did.

During the fight, while most people’s eyes were on the fight, you noticed Blake glancing back at you. When you caught her eyes once, you smiled and swore you saw her normal stoic face blush. That was good news for you. It meant your power stuck and Blake was probably thinking of their conversation and the desire she had of him touching her.

Job well done for one short session.

The fight ended and then Glynda called you up as Jaune and Cardin went back to the locker room.

Your opponent was…

152332221123212.content:
Great.

You changed and took your position in the arena. Weiss was a skilled Dust Mage and had physical abilities to boost, PLUS her glyphs which could alter the field in unpredictable ways. This wasn’t going to be good for you, but maybe Glynda was putting you against superior opponents on purpose just to pus you. That thought kept you going.

The fight began and Weiss jabbed forward. You jumped back, putting distance between you and striking back with your halberd. She parried it easily enough and send a wave of ice at you. Ice Dust she kept stock in her weapon. You jumped to the side and fired a bullet at her. She jumped to the side and used the ice to block you. Suddenly, a torrent of fire erupted from a space in between and you just managed to avoid being cooked alive. You turned your weapon into a pair of axes, the nice thing about having a large weapon it could break down into more, and charged forward.

You jumped over the ice and delivered a swipe down at Weiss. She used the rapier to block it, a bored look on her face. Your second axe came down with determination to make her at least try, when a glyph appeared between you. It turned black and blew your back. Landing on your back, Weiss pelted forward and continued to jab you while you were defenseless. You shot a bullet at her leg, which temporarily unbalanced her and the slashed at her chest.

She rolled away and sent another wave of ice at you. This time you couldn’t avoid it and got trapped. It only took a couple more jabs to bring your aura down.

“The match is done.” Glynda declared. “Miss Schnee. You need to remember that blockades can be used against you too. Mr. Anon. You need to work on your counters. Aiming for her feet was a good idea, but your follow up should have targeted her closer leg. Less time for her to react.”

“Yes, professor.” You said and followed Weiss to the locker room.

“I wish she would put me up against someone good.” Weiss muttered. “You barely put up a better fight than Arc.”

“Soooorryyy, I don’t have a rich dad to buy my fancy equipment and dust.” You spat back. God, she was so uppity all the time and you hated people like that.

“I’ll have you know, I work hard and don’t get everything handed to me.” Weiss growled, jabbing you in the chest with her finger. “You just don’t work hard enough.”

“You don’t know anything about me either.” You tell her and wipe your forehead. As you do so, you lower your eyepatch and make direct contact.

“Huh... your eye…” Weiss’s expression grew blank and her eyes dulled as you pushed your Semblance toward her.

“Let’s see. What should I do with you?”

You had to admit, while lacking a sizeable bust, Weiss was hot. Her pure white skin, petite frame, and flawless face was a site to behold. It was like she was a porcelain doll. She was also quite talented. However, her attitude could use some work. The problem was you didn’t have much time until Glynda questioned where you were. She was also stubborn, so force too much Semblance into her might cause damage.

1523322211232123.content:
You devise a devious two part plan to give the heiress of the Schnee Dust Company a taste of humiliation.

"Hand me your panties." You say, requiring the girl's undergarments for phase one.

"What?!" Weiss shook more than a leaf in wind storm, her eyes regained most of their color, and she slapped you across the face having enough free will now.

You quickly give her an eyeful to placate the Schnee into her previously more malleable and less prone to slapping you state. Had to act fast before she let out another outburst and gave anyone reason to see what the shouting's all about.

"I absolutely refuse to comply with this nonsense." Said Weiss, her voice clashing between the drone-like monotonous tone of your trance and her normal but furious voice.

"Do me some good?" That anger in her tone dissipates to a degree replaced with some confusion.

There's something eating you up inside, and I think you going panty-less for the rest of the day will make it all go away." You try to sound as persuasive as you possibly can to a girl who is partially mind controlled, and who will definitely give you more than a slap if she fully breaks out of your control.

Weiss shows some reservations about doing this, but lifts up her skirt for you. You honestly expected something fancier from the Schnee girl, they're just white panties with her emblem eteched in the center.

She shakes as she is reminded she has to take them off as well. Your semblance is kept on as Weiss hesitantly reaches for her underwear. You wish you could hurry her up without potentially ending the trance, and before someone, mainly Goodwitch, comes in and sees this little show you're conducting. The second phase of your plan greatly depends on this.

Which is to say you are going to put her underwear some place very public where she will eventually find them. Maybe she'll rightfully suspect you had something to do with it, and come after you where you'll give Weiss another eyeful. The clock is ticking.

15233222112321231.content:
You shoved the underwear in your pocket. You didn’t have much time and could place it somewhere later. Right now, you needed to finish this fast.

“You won’t remember giving me your underwear,” you tell her. “In fact, you won’t even notice you’re missing it. It’s completely natural.”

“Of course it is.” Weiss muttered, eyes still blank. Good, now to make sure she got embarrassed.

“During our next class,” you continued. “Ten minutes into Port’s lecture in Grimm Studies, you will suddenly realize you aren’t wearing underwear. However, you won’t want to leave. Do you know why?”

“Why?” Weiss asked.

“Class is to important to miss.” You tell her.

“Right. I need to get good grades.” She nodded.

“Good.” You chuckled internally. “When I turn away from you, you will snap out of your trance and continue on like normal.” You stepped back and turned around. The moment you did, you heard her shut her locker door and head back to the stands. You smiled to yourself and followed.

“What took you so long?” The guy next to him asked. “Goodwitch actually checked her watch.”

152332221123213.content:
This might be tricky you thought. You get to fight the girl who's strong as she is hot, and gets stronger the more hits she takes. Goodwitch must really want to challenge you.

Game plan time.

Physically overpowering Yang isn't happening any time soon, but thankfully she is not invincible. While her semblance, Burn, will absorb the kinetic energy every blow she receives to empower herself, it however will not make her immune to pain. It also doesn't make her immune from you coming from behind and choking her out with your halberd. You learned that from a fight you had with her last week. You almost beat her, but all you got was a broken halberd for your trouble when she broke out of that lock. Maybe she'll fall for that trick again?

If you can't go down that route you can always wear her down. Even if you lose the opportunity of an exhausted and more vulnerable Yang will present itself to your eye.

"Ready to do this with a Yang, Anon?" The buxom blonde grins cracking her knuckles.

You'd prefer the Yangs covered by her shirt to be honest. Oh, the things you would love to- Focus! Fantasize less about those tits, and plan more on not losing miserably to the girl they're attached to. Besides, if you play your cards right Yang's tits will be yours.

"Do I really have a choice?" You say back. She laughs at the sound of a lack of enthusiasm in your voice.

"I bet if I was a certain someone else your tone would be different." She said raising her eyebrows suggestively.

You tell she probably has a point before you enter a fighting stance.

Yang makes the first move, launching herself at you using her gauntlets to accelerate her movement. You manage to dodge at the last moment, but Yang is in hot pursuit and catches up fast. You cannot dodge this time. All you can do is block with your halberd, an brace yourself for impact.

"Hey, you got this thing reinforced?"

"Yeah, I did," you say as you struggle to keep your stance. "Tried to make it you-proof as much as I could."

You made Yang laugh again. You're not entirely sure if it was a "let's put that to the test" kind of laugh, or if she simply found the idea you of trying to make your weapon "Yang-proof" hilarious. She's being a good sport about this.

During the midpoint of your match with Yang it starts resembling a Dark Souls/Bloodborne boss fight. Dodging/rolling around the boss that puts out an absurd amount of damage, occasionally getting a hit in, but there is no musical theme playing along.

Yang does look somewhat tired so your strategy is working to a degree. Or you're just really boring her. Whatever the case Yang isn't tolerating it anymore. The blonde begins a more aggressive assault against you, her punches coming in at a rate you can barely keep up with. She eventually finds an opening in your shambling defense, and makes contact with your gut.

Most of the class assumed you were down for the count including Yang herself, yet the glass wearing assistant to Ozpin saw you had a bit of fight left in you. Normally, Goodwitch would end the fight here and there, yet she felt generous enough to grant you one last chance to turn this situation around.

You see Yang had her back turned on you. Looks like Plan B it is.

Your halberd. Yang's neck. Make it happen.

Your attempt was a surprising success. Yang on the other hand wasn't really appreciative of you pulling the same trick on her for a second time.

"The match is over." Goodwitch announced loud enough that the two of you could hear her over your struggle.

"Mr. Anon," she says directing her attention at you, "Tiring out your opponents is a valid strategy, but you mustn't be so timid in the face of foes stronger than you."

"I really wouldn't call it being timid, ma'am." You say scratching the back of your neck.

"And Ms. Xaio Long," she says to Yang, "You'd do well to remember to never turn your back on someone until you're certain they are incapable of continuing to fight."

You were both dismissed to the locker room, and you do you have a chance to try your hand at Yang?

This chapter went on longer than I would have liked. I still need to get better at fight scenes.

Weiss may not be as curvy as some girls here, but she is still stunning in your opinion. You do not know how she received the scar around her left eye but it adds another point of intrigue about her. Oh, and Weiss' own will power and how she feels about you. Those two factors will go a long way in this endeavor. What will you do?

This made you angry, but that anger led you to uncover your semblance. A semblance that you would use for revenge. or sex. Whatever you wanted really.

You can create complete personalities out of nothing and force them into other people. Not personality as in you can make a bland person cheery, no you create a new person in your brain and they take over whoever you put into them. You have to make and maintain eye contact long enough for the personality to hit it's target, but they're made to your specifications.

For example, that young lady with the sniper scythe that had a position in Beacon you should posses was about to be replaced by someone of your own making. You made your way to Ruby Rose, looked her in the eyes and said "Hello, my names Anon. I don't think that we've met before."

Ruby was surprised to have someone talk to her, but happily engaged in the conversation "Oh, hello. I'm Ruby. What are you doing here?"

"Well I just like to find different kinds of weapons, they're a special interest of mine. Since your here, can I assume that you're a huntress? Or at least one in training? What kind of weapon do you use?"

Having the chance to talk about Crescent Rose, Ruby began talking about her hyper fixation. This went on for a while, but it gave you enough time making eye contact for the new Ruby Rose to infect the old one. You never pinned down how long it took for a personality to hit it's mark but it was never instant.

When she stopped Ruby looked at you with respect in her eyes, gave you a solute and said "Mission accomplished sir!"

"Glad to hear it. Is it cramped in there?" You asked.

"Cramped might be the wrong word sir," Ruby explained "It doesn't feel anymore full. The older persona is trying to have fight me, but I'm in control of this body now."

Ruby fought hard at that, banging on the tv screen, trying to hit the walls inside her head. It didn't matter though,she couldn't get stop anything.

1523322213.content:
In the vastly long immortal life of Ozpin there wasn't too much left in the world that could surprise him he often tells himself. But life occasionally finds a way. And today is one of those moments with the curious case of you. You stand in his office shorter and physically younger than you were at the beginning at the start of the day.

You did not pay too much attention to your changing body until the middle of the day when it became undeniable that something was happening to your body. It became gradually more difficult for you to keep your clothes on as they were no longer fitting. By the time you got into the nurse's office you were at least 10 or 11 years old physically. Then something went on with your aura, and the nurse started acting very affectionate to you. You weren't complaining all that much. At least someone was concerned for you.

After that you got yourself some clothes that fit you and headed over here.

"Are you calmed down, Mr. Anon?" He asked referring to the outburst you had when you discovered your younger form. From what he head it befitted your age now.

"Yes, Sir," you grown in your new kid voice. Or rather your old younger voice as it sounds exactly the same as it did when you were this age originally. "This can be reversed, right?" You really didn't want to go through puberty again.

Instead of a straight answer Ozpin answers your question with one of his own. "Do you want me to tell you the truth, or do prefer a comforting lie, Anon?" It does nothing to quell the vague sense of unease you've had ever since entering this office. Judging from the look in your eye he suspects you want want the former. "I don't know."

"But will I-"

"Again. I don't know if you'll stay like this for the rest of your days or not. Semblances can be tricky things. While occasionally some might be similar the will be unique to their owner." He said.

"You are in good fortune that you are not the first person I have encountered with an age regression semblance."

You felt a little hopeful now. "Did any of them return to normal?"

Ozpin takes a sip from his mug before answering you. "Some did, yes. I knew one individual who was able to shift back and forth between a child and his mature state at will. But once again, not all semblances are the same, Mr. Anon. Your semblance could grant you an ability that sets you apart from all the others I've met. Or, you could remain a child forever. Only time will tell."

You kind of wouldn't mind being like this if you had a cool secondary effect, but you still want to go back to normal. You can't be a huntsman if your 11 years old forever. Furthermore, how are you going to get a girlfriend when you look like this? You want kids but you don't want to be a kid again. Or maybe some part of you does since semblances represent an aspect of their user? You can't imagine why you'd want to be this age again. You had a pretty normal childhood, a great one all things considered.

You pushed thoughts about if some part of your subconscious craved to be a kid again aside. You just want to get back to your dorm. You ask Ozpin if you can be dismissed now, and he allows it.

On your way back to your room you bump into the first girl to fall under the influence of "Irresistible Youth", but who will it be?

1523322213111214312.title: You're hungry. Breakfast and meet Ruby'...

15233222131112143121.content:
You felt better now that you were full. You ate a lot more than you expected with your body, but maybe it was because your Semblance was always active. Part of you wanted to experiment more with your power, but Ruby’s speech from earlier came to mind. You always wanted to be a Huntsman and you be damned if you let it end because your Semblance is stupid.

“Where are you off too, Anon?” Yang asked.

“I’m taking Ruby’s advice to heart.” You replied. “I’ll see you all later.”

“What did you tell him?” Blake asked, her eyes watching you leave. She was able to keep calm while your Passive Field affected her, but she still found you cute.

“I told him not to give up on his dreams,” Ruby said, puffing out her chest proudly. “Even if his body changed, it didn’t change who he is.”

“Huh, impressive.” Weiss complimented. “Maybe we can trust you to be around him.” She twirled the fork in her hand around. “He’s kind of cute like thought though. Almost Zwei cute.”

“Don’t compare him to Zwei.” Blake growled.

“Yeah, yeah.” Yang said. “Blake hates dogs.” She shook her head. “Hope he doesn’t push himself.” Her motherly instincts were strong in her due to an entire night of sleeping together.

At her words, Ruby looked a little worried too. She might have given too good of a speech.

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

Meanwhile, in the training room, you found out you could not use your halberd.

It was WAY too big for your small body.

That pissed you off, as it meant you might need a brand new weapon. However, you had a trick to it and it collapsed into two more manageable hand axes. They were a little big for you, but you were able to hold them. Practicing on a training dummy, you found out while your Aura was still active, you didn’t have nearly the same strength. At your current level, you would have to try a bit to beat a simple Beowolf one on one.

Cussing, you turned your axes into guns and turned the training drone into scraps.

At least you could fight to some degree. That was a silver lining in all this. You sat down and grabbed a towel to wipe off all the sweat as you thought about it. You weren’t helpless, so that was good. You would just have to retrain this body to make it stronger. As it grew stronger, your Aura would too. Maybe you could gain better control of it that way.

A long shot, but you were hopefully.

Then there was the way girls acted around you. Now that you had plenty of time to think, you realize that their strange behavior only started when they were near you. Those that came into physical contact with you were more susceptible. Yang would be the one under your influence the most, followed by Ruby. If you were interested in trying to do more with them, you would have to make sure all four girls were under.

“Not bad, Anon.”

You jumped and turned around to see…
15233222131112143121.title: Try out your halberd

152332221311121431212.content:
Ruby wore a relieved smile upon her face, and her worry of you hurting yourself subsided into nothingness. She didn't know what the cause of it was, but in her eyes you were slowly becoming the little brother she never knew she wanted. She wanted you safe and sound.

"Thanks, Ruby," you said. "It's not going to be easy, but I think I can make it." You say with confidence.

"That's what I like to hear, Anon. I can always help you out later if you want." She offers.

You smiled back at her and said you'll take Ruby up on it.

"Awesome! I'll show you all my moves and before you know it you'll be the youngest grimm killing machine around!"

1523322213111214312122.content:
You learned a lot watching Ruby. She was the youngest Huntress to enter Beacon and her skills were no joke. Not only that, she showed you how to use your size to your advantage. Using the knockback of guns, you can increase you speed or change direction in midair. Your weapons weren’t that strong, but you might be able to combine them for some similar affects. She also showed you how use your opponent’s strength against them, since she really wasn’t much stronger than you.

“Wow.” You panted. “You’re… amazing Ruby.”

“You weren’t too bad either originally.” Ruby said, sitting down next to him. “Now you just have to learn a new style.”

“Maybe the future isn’t as bleak as I thought it would be.” You admitted and she giggled.

“See?” Ruby said playfully pushing him. “You should listed to Big Sis, Ruby. She’s always right.” You rolled your eyes. “I take payment in cookies.”

“How about a hug instead?” You suggest, prepared to try to consciously use your Semblance.

“Sure. Those work too.”

As you hugged, you pushed your Aura into her as fast as possible. Your strength drained quickly but your experiment seemed to be a success. Ruby hugged you tighter and didn’t seem to want to let go. You stopped before you passed out and finally broke the hug.

“I’m… tired.” You admit and sort of lean into her. This was true, but also a test. Ruby caught you and slowly lowered your head into your lap.

“You can rest here.” Ruby told you, rubbing a hand through your hair. You closed your eyes and enjoyed the lap pillow. She saw you as a little brother now and wanted to do anything to make you happy. However, the sudden jolt of Aura into her might have pushed reasonableness out of her. Now was the time to see how far you could push her.

15233222131112143121223.content:
You yawn as your eyes grow heavier. You can always perform presumably perverted tests. Right now there is only one thing which is importan to you. The increasingly comfy lap of your new "big sister".

You just hope Ruby doesn't try whatever she was doing with Weiss last night to you during your nap.

"Sleep tight," she whispered softly into your ear as you finally closed your eyes shut.

In your dream you are opening the door to a refrigerator to find four cartons of milk, one red, one white, one black, and a yellow one. Before you could decide on which one to pick you hear the voices of Team RWBY calling out to you.

Going over to the girls you discover Ruby, Weiss, Blake, and Weiss sitting on a large bed wearing only aprons. All four of them were clearly nine months pregnant, their breasts enlarged from the hormones with Yang's tits being the largest and her apron having visible milk spots.

You hop on the bed to join the girls carrying your unborn children before they started kissing you all over.

1523322213111214313.content:
"Good morning, Ruby," says a friendly voice behind the two of you. The two of you turn around to see Pyrrha Nikos bearing a welcoming smile as she walks over to you.

"Morning to you too, Pyrrha." Ruby replied to the redhead.

It only dawned on you now that Pyrrha is a fairly tall girl when you were looking up to her from this height. Being a kid again put a lot into a new perspective. It also makes it harder to not stare at her chest when you have to look up at her, and your hormones want to assume direct control.

"And who are you?" Pyrrha asked you. "I believe I've seen your face before, and there isn't a resemblance between you and Ruby." The girl was unaware of the future now in store for her the moment she stepped into your semblance's passive field's range.

"Pyrrha, this is Anon. He is a student here, and he recently unlocked his semblance," explained Ruby.

Pyrrha was able to piece it together from there, and the look in your eyes told her "no I don't know when I will return to normal".

You have a chance to give one of the hottest and strongest girls at Beacon a dosage of your semblance. Will you do it?

15233222131113.content:
Beacon seemed much larger to you as Yang led you through the hallways. She never let go of your hand, but you noticed she took you the long way, avoiding the main hallways. Only two people saw you and out of them, only one asked about you. Yang just brushed them off and said you were a sibling to a friend of hers. That was believable enough that there was no follow up questions.

The biggest problem was the one between your pants.

You hoped Yang wouldn’t notice, but boy, luck was no on your side.

“Well,” Yang commented with an amused smirk. “One part of you seems to be growing.”

You felt yourself burn in shame.

“It’s not my fault!” You protest. “It’s these stupid kids clothes. They aren’t designed for my… package. I’m literally going through puberty a second time and then I’m being led by a beautiful girl…” You suddenly realized what you said. “I mean, umm…”

“To late there,” Yang laughed. “Smooth.”

“Sorry.” You mumbled. “Thanks for helping me back to my room.”

“Anything for a cutie like you,” Yang said and once again, you felt like something was wrong.

Maybe there was a secondary effect of your Semblance. The hard part would be to test it. Yang seemed to be treating you like a mother to a kid. Could that be changed? How far would she go to make you happy? You thought about it the rest of the way back, which was a welcome distraction from your boner.

“Your room’s pretty clean,” Yang commented.

“Just me living here.” You tell her.

“Huh, what about the rest… oh crap!” Yang suddenly remembered. Two of them were killed on a mission and the third was severely injured and was taken out by their parents. “Anon… I’m so sorry.”

“I’ve… gotten past it… mostly.” You admitted. “Sometimes I just wonder if I had been a better leader…”

“Listen,” Yang said, sitting on your bed and pulling you into her lap. “We can’t prepare for everything. Grimm are dangerous and these things happen. Your team wouldn’t want you to mope around and feel sorry for yourself, right?” You shook your head. “See? You need to keep pushing forward. But if you ever need someone to talk to or just a hug, I’ll be there for you.” She pulled you into a tight hug and your head rested comfortably on her breasts again.

You now were sure there was something going on with your Semblance and Yang. She was pampering you. Could you try more? Maybe some small tests would be worth it. Or, feeling ambitions and to learn, push it as far as you could. You could do that later too. Maybe you just want to stay and snuggle up against one of the hottest girls in school.

152332221311133.content:
Why try and push your luck? Right now you're in a situation most guys at Beacon would probably kill for to be in. You can test out our power later. You just want to forget your current troubles, and snuggle with this bombshell of a girl who feels like pampering you.

Yang herself sighs as she's reminded of the times when she had to comfort her baby sister in Ruby's times of sadness. Yang's childhood wasn't by most definitions an easy one. What with her own mother being absent in her life, her stepmother dying and her father later having his "shutdown" as Yang described it, and taking the place of Summer as a mother for Ruby. But it's like she said to you earlier. She can't mope and engage in self pity back then. She had to push forward despite the challenges. It forged Yang into who she is today with the added bonus of learning how to deal with children.

You and Yang continue to share you hug until it came to your attention your erection has returned. If you can feel it then Yang probably can too given time. Can you break the hug before things becomes awkward?

info.brief_description: Okay in this story,any group of fictional girls can become your harem.
info.description:
Okay here's what you need to know: There's two options for this. The first one is where you wake up and the girls of that anime are already your slaves, or the other one is where you enslave them.
Rule 1: No weight gain, no scat, no m/m, no vore, no unbirth.
Rule 2: Be sure to have more than one way of enslaving.
Rule 3: The mc will be referred as "your name".
Rule 4: I think that's all, be sure to have fun, but don't break my rules, or else. I'll make new rules if I have to.
Edit: 5/24/14: Rule 5: I'm now adding books, western animation, video games, comic books, live action, movies and web comics to the list.
Edit: 6/01/14: Tabletop games can now be included. Though, I guess if you wanted Sisters of Battle from Warhammer 40k, you'd have to create your own OCs you'd could do it. I'm also allowing OCs.
Edit: 8/16/15: Disregard Rule 3. Like my other story, the MC(the reader's name) will now be Anon.
Edit 1/09/20: New rule: Rule 6: no ponies or furries. Monstergirls are okay though I guess.
